name: Silence in the Dark
storyline: Jon Morgan mid 30s ex-cop now private detective. Stumbles on one of a kind case that turns his world around. After finding a book in one of main suspects room. He brings the book home and tries to figure out what is going on. The game begins in an abandoned town called "Lamias Wake". And you as a player have no memory how or when did you came here. Solve puzzles, survive, hunt or be hunted. Answer answers that left unanswered.
summary: This is 2D Horror, survival, puzzle solving, action noir inspired by classic Japanese horror games.
